Tack.origin: [successive adverse users in privity with prior adverse users can successive adverse possessions of land " Hall v. Kerlee , 461 S.E.2d 911 (1995)"]

1.1: to combine (a use, possession, or period of time) with that of another esp. in order to satisfy the statutory time period for acquiring title to or a prescriptive easement in the property of a third party [successive adverse users in privity with prior adverse users can successive adverse possessions of land "
